name: Space Game Rewritten
description:
You are lost in space. No fuel. You must use a drone to gain materials which can be used to craft food, generator fuel and thruster fuel.

Your goal is to get enough thruster fuel to move on to a station.

You have to mine for materials with your drone and craft food and other goods as well as the most important part, thrustium! The resource used to fuel your thrusters.

There is a survival system! Hunger, fatigue and other resources to manage, oxygen included.

Watch out for random events.

Made by an amateur developer with very little experience.
